entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Shamattawa
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning early this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 20 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 22 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Monday 27 February 2023
